CutSceneText.Text: Myanee! I knew I'd see you again!
Bollvig, why are you here, apart from me, in Elysea, my darling?
If you love me, you will come back with me to Asmodae.
Your trick didn't fool me for a moment!
I'll kill every human in Atreia,
if that's what it takes to bring her back.
The next time we meet, your life is mine!
